title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be consistently displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Observe the format of the retrieved datetime values in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
